casebody.head_matter:
515 A.2d 302
In re Nomination Petition of William SMOLIK, As a Candidate for United States Congress From the Twenty-Third District of Pennsylvania. Appeal of William SMOLIK.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 18, 1986.
Decided Oct. 1, 1986.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
